item.title: New style
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:10, topic:134261”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=185643.msg1680534#msg1680534 date=1187331795]

I can see more than 1 brush. The image as a whole is FLAT. It lacks depth and a light source. The light is currently coming from everywhere, you should make the far-off things within the signature darker, and blurred. The white in the very front looks bad imo, everything is a green-ish color, then you got a blast of white. That font is whored too much and the clipping mask under the text doesn’t look very good;
I rate 5/10

Ah Mr exe, maybe the best C+C’er on this forum. Even if sometimes we disagree.
[/quote]Do you disagree because I tell the truth unlike other graphic forums, or because I say somethings harshly?
FYI: I don’t start talking harshly to people when they do the same mistake repeativly, after asking for C&C and getting their answerers to a better piece of art, and still do the same thing.

exe, is this my best sig? i would just like to know?[/quote]
Imo. It’s a hell of an improvement from your ultima sig.

Read full topic
